de_AT {
    LocaleID { "0c07" }
    LocaleString { "de_AT" }
    NumberPatterns { 
            "#,##0.###;-#,##0.###",
            "\u00A4 #,##0.00;-\u00A4 #,##0.00",
            "#,##0%",
    }
    ShortCountry { "AUT" }
    localPatternChars { "GuMtkHmsSEDFwWahKzZ" }
    calendar{
        gregorian{
            DateTimeElements:intvector{
                    2,
                    1,
            }
            DateTimePatterns{
                    "HH:mm' Uhr 'z",
                    "HH:mm:ss z",
                    "HH:mm:ss",
                    "HH:mm",
                    "EEEE, dd. MMMM yyyy",
                    "dd. MMMM yyyy",
                    "dd.MM.yyyy",
                    "dd.MM.yy",
                    "{1} {0}",
            }
            monthNames{
                format{
                    abbreviated{
                            "J\u00E4n",
                            "Feb",
                            "M\u00E4r",
                            "Apr",
                            "Mai",
                            "Jun",
                            "Jul",
                            "Aug",
                            "Sep",
                            "Okt",
                            "Nov",
                            "Dez",
                            "",
                    }
                    wide{
                            "J\u00E4nner",
                            "Februar",
                            "M\u00E4rz",
                            "April",
                            "Mai",
                            "Juni",
                            "Juli",
                            "August",
                            "September",
                            "Oktober",
                            "November",
                            "Dezember",
                            "",
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    }
}
